original: Nosaññojanaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: no saññojanam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no saññojanaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: …pe… noganthaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: pe nogantham kusalam dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: …pe… nooghaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: pe no ogham kusalam dhammam paṭicca no oghaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: …pe… noyogaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: pe noyogam kusalam dhammam paṭicca noyogaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: …pe… nonīvaraṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: pe no nīvaraṇam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no nīvaraṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: …pe… noparāmāsaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noparāmāso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pe na uparāmāsam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na uparāmāsaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
